name: Phase_N_Audit_Checklist
purpose: Define the criteria and constraints required to authorize implementation of the planning runtime. This checklist does not grant authorization.

authorization_scope: Authorization applies only to planning runtime implementation
No authorization applies to execution or autonomy
implementation_constraints: Implementation must match Phase-M design artifacts exactly
No new execution hooks may be introduced
No autonomy or goal generation may be introduced
governance_enforcement: All changes must be auditable and reversible
Fail-closed behavior is mandatory on violation
negative_capability_preservation: No runtime learning or adaptation loops exist
verification_requirements: Phase-N exit marker required before any implementation

exit_requirements: Explicit authorization granted in a separate artifact
notes: Failure to satisfy any item blocks implementation authorization.
